frontmatter.title: Orchestrating External APIs

labPresets.initialPrompt: Use multiple APIs (weather + calendar) to plan an outdoor team event. Output must include location, time, and weather forecast.

examples: Combine a maps API and a traffic API to suggest the fastest route to the airport.
Use a stock API and a news API to summarize today’s market outlook.

quiz.q: True or False: API orchestration refers to coordinating multiple APIs in a single workflow.
Which of the following best describes API orchestration in LLM workflows?
choices: Chaining multiple API calls for a task
quiz.answer: Chaining multiple API calls for a task
